package.name: aerys.minko
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko package contains the Minko 3D framework.

package.name: aerys.minko.render
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render package contains the rendering API.

package.name: aerys.minko.render.effect
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render package contains the classes to define effects and the effects themselves.

package.name: aerys.minko.render.effect.basic
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render.effect.basic package contains the basic rendering effect.

package.name: aerys.minko.render.resource
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render.resource package contains all the classes related to hardware resources (texture, programs, buffers...).

package.name: aerys.minko.render.resource.texture
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render.resource package contains the class to work with texture ressources.

package.name: aerys.minko.render.shader
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render.shader package contains all the classes to create shaders, including ActionScript shaders and the JIT shaders compiler.

package.name: aerys.minko.render.shader.compiler
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render.shader.compiler package contains the ActionScript shader compiler.

package.name: aerys.minko.render.shader.part
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render.shader.part package contains the ActionScript shader parts.

package.name: aerys.minko.render.shader.part.animation
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render.shader.part.animation package contains the ActionScript shader parts related to animation.

package.name: aerys.minko.render.shader.part.projection
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.render.shader.part.projection package contains the ActionScript shader parts related to projections (cube map, Blinn/Newell, paraboloid...).

package.name: aerys.minko.scene
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.scene package contains the scene graph API.

package.name: aerys.minko.scene.controller
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.scene.controller package contains all the controllers than can be set on scene nodes.

package.name: aerys.minko.scene.node
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.scene.node package contains the available scene nodes.

package.name: aerys.minko.scene.node.mesh
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.scene.node.mesh package contains the available types of meshes and primitives (cube, sphere, quad...).

package.name: aerys.minko.scene.node.mesh.primitive
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.scene.node.mesh.primitive package contains the available mesh primitives (cube, sphere, quad...).

package.name: aerys.minko.type
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type package contains all the general purpose classes used in Minko.

package.name: aerys.minko.type.animation
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.animation package contains all the classes for the animation API including a set of timelines.

package.name: aerys.minko.type.bounding
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.bounding package contains the classes to describe bounding volumes (sphere and box).

package.name: aerys.minko.type.data
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.data package contains the scene-shader data binding API.

package.name: aerys.minko.type.enum
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.enum package contains all the enumeration classes used in Minko.

package.name: aerys.minko.type.loader
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.loader package contains the files loading API used to load assets (scenes, meshes, textures...)

package.name: aerys.minko.type.log
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.log package contains the logging API.

package.name: aerys.minko.type.math
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.math package contains all the classes defining mathematical objects (Plane, Frustum, Matrix4x4...)

package.name: aerys.minko.type.stream
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.stream package contains the stream API used to contain, create and work with 3D geometry.

package.name: aerys.minko.type.stream.format
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.stream.format package contains the classes to define vertex formats.

package.name: aerys.minko.type.stream.iterator
package.shortDescription: The aerys.minko.type.stream.iterator package contains iterators to easily read and write streams.
